name: SUSHI unROLL
description:
There's always some sushi that no one would eat in the restaurant. What if you can.. rewind the sushi and turn them into something else? 

SUSHI unROLL is a arcade style click and drag game. You are a professional sushi unroller. Yes, you job is to unroll the sushi and making them back to ingredients for reuse.  Every time you take sushi from the conveyor belt you lose some money, but don't worried, if you can fill the ingredient box on the left and make those poor sushi worth their lives, you will earn more!

[ TUTORIAL ]

Use the mouse as your hand!

Drag the plate onto the cutting board to unroll. Nigiri sushi is easy to disassemble. If you got a maki roll, drag up to unroll them, then take the ingredient away to uncover the rice. Use the spoon to scrape the rice and roll up the seaweed at the bottom.

Each box only appears for a limited time. The button on the side shows what ingredient it needs. You can press the button to send out boxes when you're done. You only get paid if you filled up a box by the request number! If you can fill multiple boxes and send them out at the same time, you will get a bonus
